h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Clear out the archer and the nearby Frozen Corpse after you finish crossing (thankfully the archer won't respawn once killed), and grab a nearby green Wisp to absorb before the outside path crumbles away, forcing you to head into the cell tunnel ring to keep moving forward.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Clear out the archer and the nearby Frozen Corpse after you finish crossing (thankfully the archer won't respawn once killed), and grab a nearby green Wisp to absorb before the outside path crumbles away, forcing you to head into the cell tunnel ring to keep moving forward.
